property.description-key: Enter the Primary Field schema which will be used to display the title on the map. For related entities use the following format (new_entityname.new_fieldname)

property.name: descriptionFieldName

property.name: latFieldName
property.description-key: Enter the Latitude field schema name. For related entities use the following format (new_entityname.new_fieldname)

property.name: longFieldName
property.description-key: Enter the Latitude field schema name. For related entities use the following format (new_entityname.new_fieldname).

property.name: pushpinColorField
property.description-key: Enter the Pushpin Color field schema name if available, this field should contain a hex value for the color.

property.name: defaultPushpinColor
property.description-key: Enter a hex value for the default color of the Pushpins(example: #ffffff).

property.name: clusteringEnabled
property.description-key: Enable clustering on the calendar (true or false).

property.name: clusterPlacement
property.description-key: Determines the output type that the file uploader will return.

value.name: MeanAverage
value.description-key: Mean Average placement calculates the average position of a group of coordinates. This method creates a more realistic representation of the data, however requires more processing power and increases the chances of pushpins overlapping.

value.name: FirstLocation
value.description-key: This method is the simplest way to represent a cluster. It places the cluster at the first location in the cluster. This method may not accurately represent the data but requires little processing power.

property.name: clusterGridSize
property.description-key: The width and height of the gird cells used for clustering in pixels. Default: 45.

property.name: clusterPushpinColor
property.description-key: Enter a hex value for the color of the cluster Pushpins(example: #ffffff).

property.name: bingMapsAPIKey
property.description-key: Enter your Bing Maps API Key.
